playerActionsDescription: Manage your profile and team membership.
managerActionsDescription: Here are the available actions for team management.
rosterSubmenuDescription: Use the buttons to manage your team's members and data.
friendliesSubmenuDescription: Organize matches, find opponents, and check your confirmed friendlies.
marketSubmenuDescription: Post or manage your team's transfer offer.

friendlyStep2Header: **Step 2/2:** Select from the menu all the time slots when your team will be looking for a rival.

offerRequirementsPlaceholder: e.g., We are looking for committed players, with a mic, available Mon-Thu from 10 PM to 11 PM CET...

welcomeDescription:
To fully participate, you must first complete your player profile.

**Click the button below to start the registration.**
managerGuideTitle: üëë Congratulations, Manager! Your team "{teamName}" has been approved.
managerGuideDescription: Welcome to the community's elite! Here is a detailed guide to your new responsibilities and tools. Your main command center is the team management panel.
managerGuideStep1Value:
Your priority is to build your team. From the `Manage Roster` submenu, you can:
‚Ä¢ **`Invite Player`**: Add members directly to your roster.
‚Ä¢ **`Promote to Captain`**: Delegate responsibilities to trusted players to help with daily management.
managerGuideStep2Value:
Activity is key to success. From the corresponding submenus, you can:
‚Ä¢ **`Manage Friendlies`**: Use `Schedule Search` to announce your availability or `Find Rival (Now)` for an immediate match.
‚Ä¢ **`Manage Transfers`**: Use `Create / Edit Offer` to post that you are looking for players.
managerGuideStep3Value:
‚Ä¢ **`Edit Team Data`**: Keep your team's data updated.
‚Ä¢ **`Open/Close Recruitment`**: Control whether your team accepts applications.
‚Ä¢ **You have full control**: You are ultimately responsible for your team.
challengeReceivedDescription: The team **{challengerTeamName}** has challenged you to a match at **{time}**.
challengeAcceptedNotification: ‚úÖ Congratulations! Your challenge against **{hostTeamName}** for **{time}** has been **ACCEPTED**.
challengeRejectedNotification: Your challenge against **{hostTeamName}** for **{time}** has been **REJECTED**.
challengeLostNotification: Sorry, your challenge against **{hostTeamName}** for **{time}** could not be accepted. The host has chosen another opponent.
hostAcceptedConfirmation: ‚úÖ You have accepted the challenge from **{challengerTeamName}**. All teams have been notified.
captainGuideTitle: üõ°Ô∏è Congratulations! You have been promoted to Captain of "{teamName}".
captainGuideDescription: The Manager trusts you to be their right hand. You have gained access to new tools in the team panel to assist with management.
captainGuideResponsibilitiesValue:
‚Ä¢ **Manage Friendlies**: You are key to keeping the team in shape.
‚Ä¢ **Manage Transfers**: Help find new talent by creating offers.
‚Ä¢ **Manage Members**: Maintain order. You can kick players (except other captains) and use the mute function.
captainGuideLimitsValue: You cannot edit team data, invite players, or promote/demote members.
applicationAcceptedNotification: Congratulations! Your application to join **{teamName}** has been **accepted**.
applicationRejectedNotification: Sorry, your application to join **{teamName}** has been **rejected**.
managerAcceptedPlayer: You have accepted **{playerName}** into your team.
managerRejectedPlayer: You have rejected the application from **{playerName}**.
playerJoinedNotification: ‚úÖ The player **{playerName}** has accepted your invitation and joined **{teamName}**!
playerRejectedNotification: ‚ùå The player **{playerName}** has rejected your invitation to join **{teamName}**.
registrationStep2: **Step 2 of 2:** Almost done! Now select your positions on the field.
profileUpdateSuccess: ‚úÖ Your profile has been successfully updated!
profileUpdateRoleAssigned: We noticed you didn't have the Player role, so we've assigned it to you!
profileUpdateRoleError: There was a problem assigning you the Player role. Please contact an administrator.
profileUpdateDmSent: ‚ÑπÔ∏è We've sent you a reminder of your player guide via DM.
profileUpdateDmError: WARNING: Could not send the reminder DM (update flow).
registrationComplete: ‚úÖ **Registration complete!** You have received the Player role on the server. Welcome!
registrationRoleError: Your profile has been saved, but there was an error assigning you the role on the server. Please contact an administrator.
successCancelledAll: ‚úÖ All pending challenge requests have been cancelled.
successMatchAbandoned: ‚úÖ The match has been cancelled. Both panels have been updated.
dmMatchAbandonedNotification: ‚ö†Ô∏è The team **{teamName}** has cancelled your match at **{time}**. The time slot is now free again.
contactOpponentMessage: To talk to the opponent, contact their manager: <@{managerId}>
dmPlayerLeftTeam: The player **{playerName}** has left your team.
ticketDescription:
Hello <@{userId}>! Your ticket has been created.

Please describe your problem or question in as much detail as possible. A staff member will assist you shortly.
ticketFooter: You can close this ticket at any time by pressing the üîí button.
errorTicketsNotConfigured: ‚ùå The ticket system has not been configured. Please contact an administrator.
errorTicketAlreadyOpen: ‚ùå You already have an open or in-progress ticket: <#{channelId}>
errorTicketInvalid: ‚ùå This channel does not correspond to a valid ticket.
errorTicketAlreadyClaimed: ‚ùå This ticket is already being handled.
errorTicketNoPermission: ‚ùå You do not have permission to handle tickets.
ticketTakenConfirmation: ‚úÖ You have taken this ticket. You are now responsible for assisting <@{userId}>.
ticketClosingMessage: üîí This ticket has been closed and will be deleted in 10 seconds.
ticketLogNewDescription: A new ticket has been opened by <@{userId}>.
ticketLogClosedDescription: The ticket from <@{userId}> was closed by <@{staffId}>.
ticketPanelDescription: Do you have any questions or issues? Open a ticket and our team will assist you privately.
ticketPanelHowToValue:
1. Press the "Open Ticket" button.
2. A private channel will be created for you and the staff.
3. Explain your issue in the new channel.
ticketPanelFooter: Please do not abuse the system.
leaderInfoTitle: Communication for Team Leaders: Friendlies and Transfers
leaderInfoDescription:
We are contacting you to inform you about the key features available for managing the competitiveness of your squad.

The operations center for all team management is located in the channel: <#{panelChannelId}>.
leaderInfoField1Value:
To maintain your team's activity and competitive level, you can efficiently organize friendly matches through the management panel.
‚Ä¢ **Procedure:** Go to the management channel and select the `Manage Friendlies` option.
‚Ä¢ **Modes:**
  - `Schedule Search`: Allows you to post your team's availability in specific time slots.
  - `Find Rival (Now)`: Initiates an immediate search for an opponent.
leaderInfoField2Value:
If you need to strengthen your squad, you can post an official offer on the community's transfer market.
‚Ä¢ **Procedure:** From the same panel, select `Manage Transfers`.
‚Ä¢ **Action:** Use the `Create / Edit Offer` option to detail the positions and requirements you are looking for. Your ad will be public to all aspiring players.
leaderInfoFooter: Regular use of these tools is essential for your team's development and visibility.
profileReminderTitle: üìù You need to complete your player profile
profileReminderDescription: We have detected that your player profile is incomplete or you do not have the corresponding role. To access all server features, please follow these steps:
profileReminderField1Title: Step 1: Go to the control channel
profileReminderField1Value: Click here to go to the <#{targetChannelId}> channel.
profileReminderField3Value: In the menu that appears, press **"Update Profile"** and fill in all your details.
profileReminderFooter: Once completed, you will automatically receive the Player role.
paginationNoTeamsOnPage: No teams found on this page.
logManagerUpdatedFollowing: The manager has updated the following data:
logFieldLogoChanged: The logo URL has been changed.
errorInviteNotForYou: This invitation is not for you.
errorUserNotInServer: It seems you are no longer in the team's server.
errorApplicationInvalid: This application is no longer valid or has already been handled.
errorNoLeaguesToDelete: There are no leagues to delete.
errorNoValidMembers: No valid roster members were found on the server.
errorRequestExpired: This request has expired or is not yours.
errorNoPermission: You do not have permission to perform this action.
viewTeamsPrompt: Choose a team to view its roster:
deleteLeaguesPrompt: Select one or more leagues from the menu to permanently delete them.
unregisteredNotificationDescription: Hello! We've noticed that you are a verified player, but you haven't yet enrolled in the active draft: **{draftName}**.
unregisteredNotificationHowToValue: It's easy. Press the button below to go to the enrollment channel and press the green "Enroll" button again. The system will now recognize you and you can complete your draft registration!
profileReminderField4Value: Remember that you have until **{fecha}** at **{hora}** to complete your registration.
unifiedRegistrationComplete: ‚úÖ Registration and verification complete! You have received the Player and Verified Player roles. You can now enroll in drafts!
registrationPCPlaceholder: Do you play on Steam or EA App?
unifiedRegistrationDraftTitle: ‚úÖ Verification Complete! Next step: Enroll in the Draft
unifiedRegistrationDraftDescription:
Congratulations, {displayName}! You are now verified.

The **{draftName}** draft is active. To participate, you have one step left:
unifiedRegistrationDraftFieldTitle: ‚û°Ô∏è Go to the enrollment channel and press the green button
unifiedRegistrationDraftFieldValue: Use the button below to go directly to the channel. Once there, press the green "Enroll" button again and the system will recognize you.
unifiedRegistrationNoDraftDescription:
Congratulations, {displayName}! Your registration has been completed successfully.

There are currently no active drafts, but you are all set. In the meantime, you can look for a team or register your own from the control panel.
registrationError: ‚ùå An error occurred while processing your registration. Please contact an administrator.
